import re

def find_hello_world(text):
    pattern = re.compile('', re.I)
    matches = pattern.findall(text)
    return ['Hello World' if match.lower() == 'hello world' else match for match in matches]

mutants.original_line: return ['Hello World' if match.lower() == 'hello world' else match
mutants.mutated_line: return ['Hello World' if match.lower() != 'hello world' else match for match in matches]
mutants.code:
import re

def find_hello_world(text):
    pattern = re.compile('\\s*(hello\\s+world)\\s*', re.I)
    matches = pattern.findall(text)
    return ['Hello World' if match.lower() != 'hello world' else match for match in matches]

mutants.original_line: return ['Hello World' if match.lower() == 'hello world' else match
mutants.mutated_line: return ['' if match.lower() == 'hello world' else match for match in matches]
mutants.code:
import re

def find_hello_world(text):
    pattern = re.compile('\\s*(hello\\s+world)\\s*', re.I)
    matches = pattern.findall(text)
    return ['' if match.lower() == 'hello world' else match for match in matches]

mutants.original_line: return ['Hello World' if match.lower() == 'hello world' else match
mutants.mutated_line: return ['Hello World' if match.lower() == '' else match for match in matches]
mutants.code:
import re

def find_hello_world(text):
    pattern = re.compile('\\s*(hello\\s+world)\\s*', re.I)
    matches = pattern.findall(text)
    return ['Hello World' if match.lower() == '' else match for match in matches]
